condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 5.1. The general public has access to information, initiatives, and platforms to increase public awareness and engagement on child rights.

description.narrative: UNICEF evidence-based advocacy strategies contributed to position key children and adolescents' issues in the public agenda, including CRC 30th anniversary, ECD, adolescent unintended pregnancy, secondary education, juvenile Justice, multidimensional child poverty, obesity prevention, Gen-U, children rights in private sector and promotion of adolescent's citizenship and participation, reaching 714,053,936 exposures through traditional media (audio-visual and graphic), and 886,553,959 through social media. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/12/2019
